name: 天天跑酷/Parkour every day
description: It is a 2D side-scrolling platformer parkour game. The game has a cartoon style and cute characters. The difficulty of the game is high, which may make people feel bad, so this game is suitable for players with a good mentality. The game's levels are very rich, and each level has different characteristics that you can explore on your own. Although the game is simple to operate, it requires different operations from different types of traps in the level, and there will be pits in some places, so the difficulty is high. Players can develop their mindset in the face of failure after failure. You can find yourself in each game and work hard to improve your operating ability!More levels will be added in the future!
